\section*{permalink: /Seminars/}

\section*{Derived Non-Sense Learning Seminar}

During the summer of 2018, I am participating in \& organizing a learning seminar on the foundational aspects of Derived Algebraic Geometry.

The goal of the seminar will evolve as time goes on. Currently, our goal is to understand homological algebra from the perspective of stable infinity categories.

The seminar will be meeting weekly at
And we will have discussion meetings on

\subsection*{Schedule}

May 10 $\vert$ Homological Algebra from the Perspective of Infinity Categories $\vert$ Attilio Castano

\subsection*{References}

\textbf{Main References}

\begin{itemize}
\item Gaitsgory and Rozenblyum - A Study in Derived Algebraic Geometry \href{http://www.math.harvard.edu/~gaitsgde/GL/}{(link)}
\item Lurie - Higher Algebra \href{http://www.math.harvard.edu/~lurie/papers/HA.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Groth - A short course on Infinity Categories \href{https://arxiv.org/pdf/1007.2925.pdf}{(pdf)}
\end{itemize}

\textbf{Simplicial Sets}

\begin{itemize}
\item Goerss and Jardine - Simplicial Homotopy Theory \href{https://www.math.univ-paris13.fr/~vallette/Goerss-Jardine.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Duggers - Sheaves and Homotopy Theory \href{http://math.mit.edu/~dspivak/files/cech.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Mathew - Dold-Kan Correspondence \href{http://math.uchicago.edu/~amathew/doldkan.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Mathew - Simplicial Commutative Rings \href{http://math.uchicago.edu/~amathew/SCR.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Reihl - A Leisurely Introduction to Simplicial Sets \href{http://www.math.jhu.edu/~eriehl/ssets.pdf}{(pdf)}
\end{itemize}

\textbf{Infinity Categories and Model Categories}

\begin{itemize}
\item Duggers - Universal Homotopy Theories \href{https://arxiv.org/pdf/math/0007070.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Rezk - Stuff about Quasicategories \href{https://faculty.math.illinois.edu/~rezk/595-fal16/quasicats.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Lurie - On Infinity Topoi \href{https://arxiv.org/pdf/math/0306109.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Lurie - Higher Topos Theory \href{http://www.math.harvard.edu/~lurie/papers/HTT.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Dwayer and Spalinski - Homotopy Theories and Model Categories \href{http://folk.uio.no/paularne/SUPh05/DS.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Hovey - Model Categories \href{https://web.math.rochester.edu/people/faculty/doug/otherpapers/hovey-model-cats.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Joyal - Notes on Quasicategories \href{https://www.math.uchicago.edu/~may/IMA/Joyal.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Cisinski - Higher Categories and Homotopical Algebra \href{http://www.mathematik.uni-regensburg.de/cisinski/CatLR.pdf}{(pdf)}
\end{itemize}

\textbf{Miscellaneous}

\begin{itemize}
\item Lurie - Derived Algebraic Geometry \href{http://www.math.harvard.edu/~lurie/papers/DAG.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Krause and Nikolaus - Lectures on THH \href{https://www.uni-muenster.de/IVV5WS/WebHop/user/nikolaus/papers.html}{(link)}
\item Arinkin and Gaitsgory - Singular Support and the Geometric Langands Conjecture \href{http://www.math.harvard.edu/~gaitsgde/GL/singsupp.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Gaitsgory and Rozenblyum - Crystals and D-Modules \href{http://www.math.harvard.edu/~gaitsgde/GL/Crystalstext.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Illusie - Complexe Cotangent et Deformations
\item Beilinson Bernstein Deligne - Faisceaux Perverse
\item Beilinson - p-adic Periods and derived de Rahm Cohomology \href{https://arxiv.org/pdf/1102.1294.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Lurie and Gaitsgory - Weil Conjectures for Function Fields \href{http://www.math.harvard.edu/~lurie/papers/tamagawa-abridged.pdf}{(pdf)}
\item Bhatt Morrow Scholze - THH and Integral p-adic Hodge Theory \href{https://arxiv.org/pdf/1802.03261.pdf}{(pdf)}
\end{itemize}
